body: Another questions,  This is an example from the website about Shade Benefit. What I understand is that the "Shade Creator" give us the area of the Roof that depend on our percentage to keep. And what I confused is how to take that information to the next step, is that the best shape for these roofs? what could i do with that "benefit area" and not benefit area.
